trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The mischievous Miqo'te looks at you expectantly.
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_001<tab>...If I ask you for help, you'll help me, won't you?
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_002<tab>You will!? Good, because I'm having a problem with a runaway doll.

TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_003<tab>That's right. All I did was lend him a little aether, and he hopped up and dashed off down the street. Mama and Papa bought him for me as a special gift─now I've gone and lost him!
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_004<tab>They'll be furious with me for losing the toy I kept asking for, so please...you have to help me find him!
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_005<tab>Okay! I'll hurry home to see if he went there...

TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_006<tab>And you can search...um...the rest of the city! Oh, he's a yellow Carbuncle doll, by the way, and I <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> he was headed north... Anyway, meet me back here when you have him, or, you know, you just give up.

TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>You find a yellow Carbuncle doll. Lifelike expressions aside, it appears to be otherwise motionless... Return to Journey's End, and deliver him to the mischievous Miqo'te.
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_008<tab><sigh> He wasn't there. I don't think I'll ever see him again...
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_009<tab><squeal> You found him! Just like Big Moony would have!
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_010<tab>Oh, that's what I call the neighbor who used to play with me. She was so tall and smart, and always so nice!
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_011<tab>She'd tell me stories about her friend─a powerful wizard─who could summon his very own Carbuncle companion. That's why I wanted one for myself!
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_012<tab>I have to learn how to move him around better, though, so that when Moony comes back she can see how hard I've been practicing my magicks!
TEXT_AKTKZA004_04183_TINYMIQOTE_000_013<tab>This is for you. Papa says that when someone helps you, you have to “show your gratitude.” So...thanks for finding my Carbuncle. Bye!
